entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 7:26 PM CDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 7:26 PM CDT Sunday 9 April 2023
